author: kfogel
msg: Apply Kalle Olavi Niemitalo's patch from issue #1270:
* tools/client-side/psvn/psvn.el: Suppress the self-inserting keys in
svn-status-mode-map.

author: kfogel
msg: Apply Kalle Olavi Niemitalo's patch from issue #1268:
Recent development versions of Emacs fix the bug whereby vc-print-log
would forget to call vc-FOO-show-log-entry.  Now that the bug is gone,
Emacs correctly tries to jump to the log entry corresponding to the
current file's revision -- except that we had a bogus regexp, so the
jump would fail :-).
* tools/client-side/vc-svn.el
(vc-svn-show-log-entry): Fix the regexp, and remove the comment
about this function never getting called.

author: sussman
msg: Continue work on issue #891: "REPORT fails if item missing in HEAD."
Make ra_dav attempt a new-style update-report, and if failure,
fall back on the old-style report.
* libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (make_reporter): unconditionally write new
<src-path> element to the update-report request body.  This is the
original path that used to be the object of the REPORT request; now
*both* paths & revs are in the request body, ready to be marshalled
into svn_repos_dir_delta.
(reporter_finish_report): try running the REPORT against the VCC; if
the server rejects that, then fall back to running it on the
src-path, as in olden days.

author: cmpilato
msg: Begin implementation of support for 'depth' (as opposed to
recursive/non-recursive).  This is Issue #781.
* subversion/include/svn_types.h
(svn_depth_t): New type to represent the depths of operations.
(APR_ARRAY_PUSH): New (I simply can no longer stand trying to
remember the usage syntax for apr_array_push).
* subversion/include/svn_path.h
(svn_path_condense_targets): Add 'depth' parameter, and redocument.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/target.c
(redundancy_check): New helper.
(svn_path_condense_targets): Add 'depth' parameter, and the code to
support it.
* subversion/libsvn_client/log.c
(svn_client_log): Update calls to svn_path_condense_targets().
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit.c
(svn_client_commit): Update call to svn_path_condense_targets().
* subversion/clients/cmdline/commit-cmd.c
(svn_cl__commit): Update call to svn_path_condense_targets().
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/target-test.c
(usage): New.
(main): Update calls to svn_path_condense_targets(), and handle a
new 'depth' program argument.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/target-test.py
(tests): Update to match the new return values from
svn_path_condense_targets(), and to pass the depth parameter to
the target-test binary.  Also, duplicated the previous tests (of
depth infinity) for depth zero.

author: kfogel
msg: Handle executable files:
* tools/cvs2svn/cvs2svn.py
(Dump.add_or_change_path): Set the svn:executable property and
adjust lengths accordingly, for executable files.
